name.en: Freshman English as an Introduction to Science

notice.ch: 高級課程。限英文被分至高級者選修。不開放初選。

remark.ch: 高級課程。限英文被分至高級者選修。不開放初選。

goal.ch:
新制大一英文課程目標 CEFR B2 15 
Descriptors
Listening 聽力
1.能聽懂用標準口語所說的內容大意。
2.能在主題熟悉的情況下，了解大部分音檔和影片的重點。
3.能在講者陳述清晰的情況下，了解個人專業領域內的課程或演講。

SPEAKING - Spoken Production 口語發表
4.能在事先準備的情況下，就感興趣的主題進行發表，並詳盡描述內容。
5.能透過提出論點、利弊、或因果關係等方法，來表達對一個議題的看法。

SPEAKING - Spoken Interaction 口語互動
6.能以一定的流暢度、自然地進行口語互動。
7.能在努力投入的情況下，跟上並參與小組討論。

READING 閱讀
8.能快速瀏覽長篇複雜文本並掌握所需的細節。
9.能搜尋和瀏覽多個資料出處以獲取相關資訊。
10.能理解個人專業領域或感興趣主題的文本大意。
11.能了解文章作者的觀點。

WRITING寫作
12.能寫出拼字和標點符號用法正確的文章。
13.能寫出描述清楚、提供細節的文章。
14.能寫出結合多個來源想法的文章。
15.能寫出清楚的理由來支持自己的論點。
goal.en:
CEFR B2 15 Descriptors
Listening
1. I can understand the main ideas of what is    said to me in standard spoken English. 
2. I can understand the main ideas of most      audios and videos of familiar topics.
3. I can follow a lecture or talk within my own     field if the presentation is clear.

SPEAKING - Spoken Production
4. I can give a clear, prepared presentation      about topics I am interested in and provide      detailed descriptions.
5. I can express my opinion on an issue by      giving reasons, talking about the advantages   and disadvantages, or analyzing cause and     effect.

SPEAKING - Spoken Interaction
6. I can interact quite fluently and naturally in   
       conversations.
7. I can, with some effort, keep up with and      ontribute to group discussions.

READING
8. I can scan quickly through long and complex texts and find the details I want.
9. I can search and browse various sources to obtain relevant information.
10. I can understand the main ideas of reading materials within my field of study or of my          
     interest.
11. I can understand the writer’s point of view  
   when reading an article.

WRITING
12. I can write an essay with reasonably          
        accurate spelling and punctuation.
13. I can write an essay with clear descriptions and proper details.
14. I can write an essay combining the ideas    
     from multiple sources.
15. I can write an essay giving reasons to        
 support my point of view.

gradMethod.ch:
1. 出席(10％)
2. 課堂發言(10％)
3. 課堂口頭報告(20％)
4. 作業(20％)
5. 線上聽力小考(20％)
6. 期末考(20％)
各項之規定與要求請見英文版說明
gradMethod.en:
1. Attendance (10％): Classes are mandatory.  For each class-hour absence 2 points will be deducted from the final grade.  A medical leave requires proof of medical care.  All other excused leaves also require proof.  All students are expected to attend class on time.  For each tardiness 1 point will be deducted.  Absence of more than 5 class-hours will result in a failing grade for the course..
2. Class participation (10％): Students are expected to prepare for and participate in class activities.  They are required to contribute to class discussions at least 10 times. 
3. Presentations (20％):There will be an individual 4-minute presentation with visual aids, which is scheduled around the mid-term week. 
4. Weekly Practice and Assignments (20％)
5. Online Quizzes (20％): Students take online quizzes upon the completion of each unit.
6. Unified Final Exam (20％):  All the students of intermediate level in the Freshman English program take the same listening exam.

en: Department:Department of Mathematics、Department of Physics、Department of Chemistry、Department of Optics and Photonics、Joint Science Program、Department of Life Sciences only.Year:First Year only.
